channel.title: Recipes on Cravey.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on Cravey.dev

item.title: Amish Oatmeal
item.description:
ğŸ½ Amish Style Baked Oatmeal ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 2 cups old fashioned rolled oats
  2. 0.75 cup brown sugar
  3. 1 cup chopped walnuts/pecans
    1. optional
  4. Raisins or cranraisins or cranberries as wanted
  5. 1 teaspoon baking powder
  6. 2 teaspoon cinnamon
  7. 0.5 teaspoon salt
  8. 2 large eggs
  9. 2 cups milk
  10. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  11. 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted
  12. 2 honeycrisp apples, cut into 0.5inch squares

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Preheat oven 325F
  2. Grease 8 or 9 inch dish with butter
  3. Medium bowl: Mix:
    1. Oats
    2. Brown Sugar
    3. Half total nuts
    4. Raisins
    5. Baking powder
    6. Cinnamon
    7. Salt
  4. Other bowl: Whisk:
    1. Eggs
    2. Milk
    3. Vanilla
  5. Add milk mixture to oat mixture, along with butter
  6. Scatter apples evenly on bottom of dish
  7. Pour mixture over top and spread evenly
  8. Sprinkle remaining half nuts on top
  9. Bake 40-45min

Nutritional Information: Servings: 6 Per serving: 411 calories 17g fat 8g saturated fat 60g carbs 36g sugar 5g fiber 10g protein 322mg sodium 90mg cholesterol

item.title: Apple Crisp
item.description:
ğŸ½ Apple Crisp ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

Apple portion

  1. 6 honey crisp apples, chopped
  2. 2 tablespoons sugar
  3. 0.75 teaspoon cinnamon
  4. 1.5 teaspoon lemon juice

Crisp portion

  1. Separate 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  2. 0.75 cups oats
  3. 0.75 cup flour
  4. Pinch salt
  5. 1 cup brown sugar

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Preheat oven 350F
  2. Pour apple portion ingredients into pan, mush
  3. Mix crisp portion and gently press over apple portion
  4. Bake 40-50mins

item.title: Banana Bread
item.description:
ğŸ½ Banana Bread ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 2-3 ripe bananas, smashed
  2. 0.66 cups melted, unsalted butter
  3. 1 teaspoon baking soda
  4. 1.5 cups flour
  5. pinch salt
  6. 0.75 cups granulated sugar
  7. 2 eggs beaten
  8. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Preheat 350F
  2. Spray loaf pan
  3. Mash bananas until smooth
  4. Add baking soda
  5. Stir in butter
  6. Stir in sugar, salt, eggs, pure vanilla
  7. Mix in flour
  8. Put into tin
  9. Bake on center rack for 50-60min

item.title: Beans
item.description:
ğŸ½ Beans, just beans ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. Beans, dry, any kind
  2. Stock
  3. Seasoning

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Soak dry beans for 8-24 hours
  2. Remove floating beans and rinse thoroughly with cold water
  3. If adding garlic and onions, etc., put some oil in and cook until fragrant
  4. Add beans and stock until covered by 2-3 inch of liquid
  5. Bring to boil and add salt
  6. Skim off foam and discard
  7. Cook covered or uncovered for 2 hours or until tender

item.title: Biscotti
item.description:
ğŸ½ Biscotti, plain ->#

Ingredients check twice

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 2.5 cups + 2 teaspoons flour
  2. 1.5 teaspoons baking powder
  3. 0.5 teaspoons salt
  4. 0.5 cups sugar (coconut or other)
  5. 0.75 cups brown sugar
  6. 3 eggs
  7. 0.5 cups + 1 tablespoon oil
  8. 1 teaspoon almond extract, or 2 teaspoon vanilla
  9. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  10. 1 teaspoon zest lemon or orange Optional
  11. 1 cup chopped nuts
  12. 0.5 cup chopped fruit

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Preheat over 325F
  2. Whisk together dry ingredients
    1. Whisk in nuts/fruit if adding
  3. In separate bowl, whisk eggs, oil, extract, zest
  4. Add dry to wet and stir
  5. Scoop out dough into 2 rectangular logs and put on baking sheet with parchment
  6. Bake for 30min
  7. Remove from oven and allow to completely cool (30-60min)
  8. Move to cutting board
  9. Cut at angle or straight 0.5 or 0.75 inches thick
  10. Transfer to cooking sheet and bake again, bottom side down, for 10-15min

Shelf Life - frozen for one month

item.title: Biscuits
item.description:
ğŸ½ Biscuits ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 2 cups Bob’s Red Mill 1:1 Baking Flour
  2. 2 tablespoon baking powder
  3. 1 teaspoon salt
  4. 5 tablespoons butter, cold
  5. 1 cup milk

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Preheat oven 425F
  2. Combine dry
  3. Cut in butter
  4. Add wet
  5. Make into circle and cut in triangles
  6. Bake for 15 minutes

item.title: Braised Beef Neck Bone Stew
item.description:
ğŸ½ Braised Beef Neck Bone Stew ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. Oil or fat for searing
  2. 4 pounds neck bones
  3. Salt to taste
  4. 1 onion, sliced
  5. 2 garlic cloves, smashed
  6. 1 tablespoon tomato paste
  7. 1 teaspoon dried thyme
  8. 0.5 teaspoon dried thyme
  9. 0.5 teaspoon black pepper
  10. 0.5 cup red wine
  11. 1 cup unsalted beef stock

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Preheat over to 325F
  2. Heat oil/fat in Dutch oven.
  3. Sprinkle beef with salt and sear.
  4. When browned, set aside
  5. In same pot, add onion and salt until soft
  6. Add garlic, paste, thyme, pepper, and cook for another minute or two
  7. Deglaze with red wine by scraping Dutch oven with wooden spoon
  8. Add beef bones/stock to pot, bring to simmer, cover, put in oven until tender (approx 2.5 hours)

item.title: Chicken Cacciatore
item.description:
ğŸ½ Chicken Cacciatore ->#

Serve with pasta Serving size: 4

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 4 chicken thighs
  2. 2 chicken breasts
    1. sub for 4 additional thighs
  3. 1 teaspoon salt
  4. 1 teaspoon pepper
  5. 0.5 cup flour
  6. spoonful of corn starch
  7. 3 tablespoon olive oil
  8. 1 red bell bepper, chopped
  9. 1 onion, chopped
  10. 6 garlic cloves, finely chopped
  11. 1.5 teaspoon dried oregano
  12. 0.75 cups dry white wine

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Sprinkle salt and pepper on chicken
  2. Dredge in flour to coat
  3. Large heavy sautÃ© pan:
    1. Preheat pan on medium heat
    2. Add oil
    3. Add chicken
    4. SautÃ© until browned - roughly 5min per side
    5. Transfer to plate
  4. Add bell pepper, onion, garlic, oregano to same sautÃ© pan and sautÃ© until onion is tender, roughly 5min
  5. Add wine and simmer until reduced by half, approx. 3min
  6. Add tomatoes, broth, and capers
  7. Return chicken to pan, turning and covering in sauce
  8. Bring to simmer over medium heat, approx 30min thighs, 20min breasts
  9. Transfer chicken to plate
  10. Boil sauce for 3min
  11. Spoon excess fat from top
  12. Spoon sauce over chicken and pasta, add basil

item.title: Chocolate Pudding
item.description:
ğŸ½ Chocolate Pudding ->#

Now GHB-free.

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 0.25 cups + 1 tablespoon cornstarch
  2. dash of salt
  3. 0.5 cups white sugar
  4. 3 cups whole or 2% milk
  5. 6 ounces semi sweet baking chocolate
  6. 1 cup chocolate chips
  7. 0.5 teaspoons vanilla extract

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Pour milk into medium saucepan
  2. Whisk in corn starch and salt, sugar until no lumps
  3. Place saucepan on medium-low heat and cook for 8-10mins, while stirring continuously, scraping bottom and sides of saucepan
  4. When thickened, add chocolate, stir continuously for 2-3mins until melted
  5. Stir in vanilla
  6. Put in container
  7. Chill for 2-3 hours

item.title: Cinnamon Rolls
item.description:
ğŸ½ Cinnamon Rolls ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 1 cup warm milk (110-115F)
  2. 2.25 teaspoons instant yeast
  3. 0.5 cup sugar
  4. 0.5 cup butter (110-115F), unsalted
  5. 2 eggs
  6. 1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar
  7. 3.5 cups flour
  8. 2 teaspoons baking powder
  9. 0.25 teaspoon salt Frosting
  10. 0.5 cup softened butter
  11. 1 cup brown sugar
  12. 1.5 tablespoon ground cinnamon
  13. 0.5 teaspoon vanilla extract

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Preheat oven to 100F then turn off
  2. Add sugar to large mixing bowl
  3. Separate bowl:
    1. Whisk 2 eggs
    2. Let come to room temp
  4. Warm milk (110-115F), microwaving 1min at a time
  5. Add sugar and compine
  6. Add yeast to mixture and allow to bubble (few minutes)
  7. Melt butter, ensuring to be below 115F. Pour apple cider vinegar,and eggs to bowl and mix
  8. Add flour, baking powder, salt
    1. Stir to combine complete. Should feel tacky
    2. Put in oven-proof bowl, cover with plastic wrap and kitchen towel
    3. Put in oven for 1 hour
  9. At 50min, making filling by adding butter, sugar, cinnamon, vanilla
  10. Remove dough and preheat oven to 350F.
  11. Roll dough out on floured parchment paper into rectangle 1 inch thick.
  12. Smooth on filling
  13. Roll dough tightly
  14. Cut into 12 rolls
  15. Place in greased 9x13
  16. Bake 25-30min
  17. Making frosting and drizzle

item.title: Coconut Rice Thai Basil Beef
item.description:
ğŸ½ Coconut Rice with Thai Basil Beef ->#

Serving size: 4

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 14 ounce can unsweet coconut milk
  2. 0.75 cups water
  3. 1 stalk lemongrass
    1. sub with 3-4 slices of peeled, fresh ginger
  4. 1 cup jasmine rice
  5. 0.25 cup + 1 teaspoon low-sodium soy sauce
  6. Juice of 2 limes
  7. 1 tablespoon sugar
  8. 2 persian cucumbers, quartered lengthwise, then halved
  9. 1 cup packed basil roughly chopped
  10. 2 tablespoon vegetable oil
  11. 1 pound ground beef
  12. 1 red bell pepper, chopped
  13. 3 garlic cloves, minced

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Medium saucepan, boil:
    1. Coconut milk
    2. Water
    3. Lemongrass/ginger
  2. Add rice and raise to boil while stirring
  3. Cover for 10min
  4. Whisk 0.25 cup soy sauce, lime juice, toss with cucumber, basil, 1 teaspoon soy sauce
  5. Heat vegetable oil, brown beef
  6. Add vegetable oil
  7. Cook bell pepper 5min
  8. Add garlic
  9. Cook 2min
  10. Increase heat to high and return beef and juice, add soy/lime juice and cook until evaporates (2min)
  11. Add basil and cook for 1min
  12. Serve beef and cucumber salad over rice

item.title: Dinner Rolls
item.description:
ğŸ½ Dinner Rolls ->#

Serving size: 18 rolls

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 3 cups flour
  2. 1 teaspoon salt
  3. 1.75 (measurement/) rapid/instant yeast
  4. 1.25 cups warm milk (110-115F)
  5. 0.25 cup butter, softened, unsaltened
  6. 2 eggs (room temperature)
  7. 0.5 cup honey (we usually half this)
  8. 1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar
  9. 2 tablespoon butter, melted

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. In large bowl, add:
    1. Flour
    2. Salt
    3. Xanthan gum(leave out if flour has it)
  2. Add yeast by making hole in flour, pour yeast in
  3. Warm milk to 110-115F
  4. Add softened butter, eggs, apple cider vinegar, and honey to bowl
  5. Mix until fully combined
  6. Butter two 9 inch pans
  7. Use spoon to scoop dough balls onto pans
  8. Put butter on dough balls in circle with 1 inch in middle
  9. Cover tightly with plastic wrap and put kitchen towel over
  10. Put in warm place
    1. I preheat oven to 100F, turn off, leave closed
  11. Leave to rise for 1 hour
  12. Remove pans, take off plastic wrap
  13. Preheat oven to 400F
  14. Bake rolls on middle rack for 14-16min, watching because they burn easily
  15. Cover in melted butter and serve

item.title: Egg Pasta
item.description:
ğŸ½ Egg Pasta ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 1.5 cups Bob Mills GF 1:1 flour
  2. 0.5 teaspoon xanthan gum
  3. 0.25 teaspoon salt
  4. 3 large eggs

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. In mixer with paddle
    1. Combine all and leave going for 5-10min
  2. Remove and roll into balls
  3. Wrap in plastic wrap
  4. Let rest for 15min
  5. Roll out, cut, boil water and cook for 2-3min or until floats

item.title: Key Lime Pie
item.description:
ğŸ½ Key Lime Pie ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. Pie crust, premade or homemade
  2. 0.5 cup fresh (key) lime juice
  3. 1 teaspoon lime zest
  4. 7 ounce sweetened condensed milk
  5. 13.5 ounce coconut milk
  6. 5 tablespoons corn starch
  7. Pinch salt
  8. Cool Whip

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. In pre-heated saucepan, add:
    1. Filling ingredients
    2. Stir occasionally
  2. When boiling, now stirring constantly:
    1. Lower heat to medium
    2. Cook 7-9 minutes
  3. When thickened, pour into pie crust and tap to remove air bubbles
  4. Refrigerate at least 5 hours

item.title: Leftover Fruit Jam
item.description:
ğŸ½ Leftover Fruit Jam ->#

Cooking Ratios Cheat Sheet 1:1 fruit:sugar or 2:1 fruit:sugar for higher pectin fruits like tart fruits

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. Fruit
  2. Sugar
  3. 0.25 cup lemon juice or citric acid (1 lemon for 2 pounds)
    1. Add lemon peel for additional pectin

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. In pot, doing nothing, add:
    1. Fruit
    2. Sugar
    3. Lemon
  2. Wait 30 minutes to 24 hours.
  3. Now, stir and bring to boil over medium heat stirring occasionally
  4. 220F (104-105C), then let cool and thicken

item.title: Lemon Butter Pasta
item.description:
ğŸ½ Lemon Butter Pasta ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 2 sticks butter, unsalted
  2. Pasta
  3. 2 lemons worth of zest and juice

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. While pasta is boiling, melt butter in pan
  2. Put in zest and lemon juice, whisk to combine
  3. Salt to taste
  4. Using tongs, transfer cooked pasta into pan- do not drain
  5. Stir/fold over pasta to coat in sauce
  6. Serve with zest if desired

item.title: Lemon Capellini
item.description:
ğŸ½ Lemon Capellini ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 0.5 pounds (2 sticks) butter, unsalted
  2. 2 lemons-worth of zest and juice
  3. salt
  4. pepper

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Boil water and salt to make pasta
  2. SautÃ© butter, zest, juice, add seasonings
  3. Add cooked pasta with tony’s
  4. Add pasta water if needed

item.title: Lemon Garlic Roasted Chicken
item.description:
ğŸ½ Lemon Garlic Roasted Chicken ->#

Serving size: 4-6

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. Oil for baking dish
  2. 4 bone-in chicken thighs
  3. salt
  4. black pepper
  5. zest and juice from2 lemons
  6. 1 large garlic clove, grated
  7. 2 teaspoons dried oregano
    1. or Italian seasoning
  8. 0.33 cup olive oil

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Preheat oven to 450F
  2. Grease 9x13 or larger baking dish
  3. Season chicken generously with salt and pepper in dish
  4. In small bowl, whisk:
    1. Lemon zest
    2. Lemon juice
    3. Garlic
    4. Oregano
    5. Then, olive oil
  5. Drizzle half mixture on chicken, saving other half
  6. Let chicken sit for 15-30min
  7. Roast chicken for 20min
  8. Take out and stir in brown bits. Drizzle remaining over top and return to oven for another 15-20min
    1. Internal temp needs to be 165F
  9. Transfer to plate and let rest for 10min
  10. Stir sauce at bottom of pan, put sauce over and serve
  • TODO Add temperature for roasted temperature in this recipe

item.title: Made Up Tomato Sauce
item.description:
ğŸ½ Made-up Tomato Sauce ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 2 big spoonfuls of tomato paste
  2. 1 big spoonful minced garlic
  3. 1 small spoonful Italian seasoning or fresh herbs
  4. 1 lemon zest and juice
  5. 1 big spoonful olive oil
  6. 1 small spoonful brown sugar
  7. 1 splash of dry white wine

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Whisk all ingredients together
  2. Use on white fish or chicken, completely covering it.

item.title: Meatloaf
item.description:
ğŸ½ Meatloaf ->#

Loaf with meat, meat in loaf form.

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. Ground meat of some kind
  2. Eggs
  3. Oatmeal
  4. Salt
  5. Pepper
  6. Onions
  7. Garlic, minced
  8. Can of tomatoes
  9. Any other garden veggies that might be good

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Preheat oven to 350F
  2. Combine all ingredients
    1. Fold eggs into meat
    2. Add oatmeal
      1. Want mixture thick but not dough-like
    3. Add can of tomatoes (drained)
    4. Add onions, garlic, salt, pepper, and anything else
    5. If things added, add more moisture add more oats
  3. Put in bread pans
  4. Bake until cooked
    1. Check at 30min
    2. Internal temperature 165F-ish

item.title: Mexican Rice
item.description:
ğŸ½ Mexican Rice ->#

Rice 2:1 liquid:rice

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 3 tablespoons oil
  2. 1 cup rice
  3. Seasoning
  4. 2 cup broth
  5. Tomatoes

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Cook rice and everything in sauce pan until puffy and golden
  2. Add broth
  3. Bring to boil, reduce heat, cover for 20-25 minutes off heat

item.title: Mozzarella Cheese
item.description:
ğŸ½ Mozzarella Cheese ->#

Shelf life: Freezer: 6 months Fridge: 1 week To store: Put in small container with teaspoon of salt and whey

Half rennet tab will last in fridge for 1 year

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 1 gram A2 raw or low-temp/VAT pasteurized milk
  2. 1.5 teaspoon citric acid
  3. 1 cup purified water
  4. 0.5 rennet tablet, dissolved in 0.25 cup purified water
  5. 0.5 teaspoon cheese or flaky salt
  6. 1.25 cup distilled water (purified is fine)

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Measure out 1 cup water in small bowl and add citric acid
  2. Stir until dissolved
  3. Measure out 0.25 cup water in another bowl
  4. Dissolve rennet tablet
  5. Pour citric acid into pot, followed by gallon of milk.
  6. Set pot over medium/high heat and warm to 90F while stirring gently
    1. DO NOT HEAT TOO FAR OVER 90F
  7. Remove from heat and add rennet solution
    1. Stir for 30 seconds
    2. Cover pot and leave for 10 minutes
  8. Milk should look like soft tofu
    1. Leave for longer if it doesn’t curd
  9. Using metal spatula or knife, cut curds into uniform grid
  10. Warm pot over medium/high heat to NO MORE than 106F.
    1. Stir them slowly as they warm, but don’t break them up too much
    2. Curds will clump
    3. Save whey- good for soups, whey butter, dogs, ets.
  11. Remove pan from heat and stir for another 5min. Ladel curds into microwave safe bowl with slotted spoon
  12. Microwave curds for 1 minute
  13. Drain off whey- can use cheese cloth
    1. Fold curd over a few times
  14. Microwave 30 seconds
    1. Check internal temp
    2. Needs to be 135F
    3. Repeat until 135F
  15. Sprinkle cheese salt and squish into. Stretch and fold repeatedly. Should tighten and become glossy.
  16. Shape into 1 or 2+ balls

item.title: Panang Curry
item.description:
ğŸ½ Panang Curry ->#

Serve with rice.

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. Protein options - desired amount
    1. Firm tofu (14g)
    2. Chicken
  2. 2 tablespoons oil or fat
  3. 2 garlic cloves, minced
  4. 1 yellow onion, sliced
  5. 1 red pepper (2 inch slices)
  6. 1 orange pepper (2 inch slices)
  7. 4 ounce panang curry paste
  8. 1 can coconut milk
  9. 1 teaspoon salt
  10. 1 tablespoon peanut butter
  11. 1 tablespoon soy sauce or tamari

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Preheat large skill or wok over medium heat
  2. Add garlic
    1. SautÃ© for 30 seconds
  3. Add onion and peppers
    1. Cook for 2-3min or until slightly tender
    2. Push veggies to side
  4. Add panang curry and fry for a few seconds, then mix with veggies
  5. Stir in coconut milk and mix
  6. Add half basil leaves, protein, and salt. Mix
  7. Cover and cook on medium heat for 5min or until comes to gentle boil
  8. Add peanut butter, soy sauce, and mix well
  9. Garnish with lime and remaining Thai basil

item.title: Pancakes
item.description:
ğŸ½ Pancakes ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 2 large eggs
  2. 1.25 cups milk
  3. 3 tablespoons butter (melted
  4. 0.75 teaspoon salt
  5. 2 teaspoons baking powder
  6. 2 tablespoons sugar

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Beat milk and eggs until light/foamy
  2. Stir in butter
  3. Separately, whisk dry together
  4. Mix into wet
  5. Heat pan while batter rests
  6. Let rest for 15min, if patient
  7. IMPORTANT: butter in hot pan, sprinkle flaky salt, then pour batter

item.title: Patty Melt
item.description:
ğŸ½ Patty Melt ->#

Cheap, fast, and easy.

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. Oil or fat
  2. 1 large onion, sliced
  3. 1.25 pounds ground chuck
  4. 0.5 teaspoon pepper
  5. 0.25 cup mayonnaise
  6. 1 tablespoon dijon mustard
  7. 1 tablespoon barbeque sauce
  8. Cheese Sticks
  9. 8 bread slices

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Preheat skillet over medium heat
  2. Add oil or fat
  3. Add onion and half teaspoon salt
  4. Cook, stirring often until golden brown and soft (20ish minutes) Set aside.
  5. Cook patties (about 2min a side)
  6. Transfer to plate
  7. Stir together mayonnaise, mustard, barbeque sauce, and ketchup in small bowl
  8. Divide cheese among slices. Put on sauce, cheese, meat, and onions.
  9. Fry each sandwich until golden brown (approx 3min per side)

item.title: Pecan Biscotti
item.description:
ğŸ½ Pecan Biscotti ->#

A flavor of Biscotti.

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 0.25 cup butter
  2. 0.75 cup sugar
  3. 0.5 teaspoon salt
  4. 1 teaspoon vanilla
  5. 1 egg
  6. egg white
  7. 2 cup flour
  8. 1.5 teaspoon baking powder
  9. 0.75 cup chopped pecans

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Preheat oven 350F
  2. Mix butter, sugar, salt, vanilla
  3. Add egg + egg white
  4. Add flour, baking powder, nuts
  5. Foam into log
  6. Cook for 30-35min
  7. Cut 0.5 inch thick
  8. Bake for 15-20min

item.title: Picanha
item.description:
ğŸ½ Picanha ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. picanha
  2. salt - coarse or flake
  3. pepper - coarse

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Let rest
  2. Preheat grill/smoker/oven 200-225
  3. Fatback up, cut filets at three finger width
  4. Score fat
  5. Fold into a “C” shape, with fat on the outside
  6. Churrasco skewers through the “C”
  7. Towel meat to remove moisture
  8. Liberally apply salt and pepper all over
  9. Put in grill, off flame
  10. 10ish minutes and flip
  11. 10ish minutes and pull off (120 F ish?)
  12. Let rest 15 minutes
  13. Sear all around, rotating every minute
  14. Let rest 10 minutes
  15. Serve

item.title: Reverse Sear Steak
item.description:
ğŸ½ Reverse Sear Steak#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. steak - ribeye
  2. salt - coarse or flake
  3. pepper - coarse
  4. butter
  5. garlic cloves
  6. fresh thyme

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Let rest on countertop, preferred one hour but it doesn’t matter
  2. Preheat oven to 225 F
  3. Pat steaks dry and generously season with salt and pepper
  4. Place steaks on pan with wire rack
  5. Place in oven for approximately 10 minutes
  6. Flip steaks and keep in oven for approximately 10 minutes
  7. Goal is 10-15 F below preferred cook temp Rare (120Â°F final):Â Remove from oven at 105Â°F, about 20â€“25 minutes. Medium-rare (130Â°F final):Â Remove from oven at 115Â°F, about 25â€“30 minutes. Medium (140Â°F final):Â Remove from oven at 125Â°F, about 30â€“35 minutes.
  8. Let rest, and preheat skillet on range
  9. Sear 60-90 seconds on each side
  10. Sear edges for 15 seconds each

item.title: Sandwich Bread
item.description:
ğŸ½ Sandwich Bread ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 3 cups (495g) Bob Mill’s 1:1 Gluten Free Baking Flour
  2. 1.5 teasponns (6g) yeast
  3. 2 teaspoons (10g) salt
  4. 3 tablespoons (38g) sugar
  5. 5 tablespoons (51g) neutral oil
  6. 2 egg wgites (large)
  7. 1.5 cups 95F water

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Flour, yeast, sugar, salt to mixer bowl and mix
  2. Add water, egg whites, oil
  3. Beat for 2-3 minutes
  4. Cover and let sit for 30-45 minutes until dough doubles
  5. 9x5 inch pan - line or grease
  6. 375F oven for 45-60min until bread reaches 195F
  7. Let cool for 10min before moving to dry rack to let cool completely

item.title: Sardine Pasta
item.description:
ğŸ½ Sardine… Pasta ->#

This disgusts me, Liz.

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 8 ounces pasta
  2. 6 tablespoon oil
  3. 0.25 cup shallots minced
  4. 2 teaspoon lemon zest
  5. 0.5 teaspoon red pepper flakes
  6. 0.5 teaspoon salt
  7. 4.375 (?) ounces sardines, drained
  8. 3 tablespoon capers rinsed
  9. 5 tablespoon minimum of lemon
  10. 3 tablespoon of fresh parsley or basil
  11. parmesan

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Boil water
  2. SautÃ© shallots, lemon zest, red pepper, and salt until translucent
  3. Add sardines and caper
  4. SautÃ© for 2min, break up sardines
  5. Cook pasta and keep water
  6. Add pasta to pan with sardines, toss while adding pasta water

item.title: Scones
item.description:
ğŸ½ Scones ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 1.5 cups (240g) 1:1 gluten free flour
  2. 0.25 cups (50g) sugar
    1. for savory scones, 1 tablespoon
  3. 1 tablespoon baking powder
  4. 0.5 teaspoon salt
  5. 8 tablespoon (13g) frozen butter
  6. 0.33-0.5 cup of mix-ins
  7. 1 egg
  8. 1 teaspoon vanilla
    1. for savory scones, none
  9. 0.66 cup sour cream (yogurt?)

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Combine dry and sugar
  2. Grate butter and cut in
  3. Add mix-ins
  4. Separate bowl, combine wet
  5. Stir in wet until combined
  6. Put dough out and wrap in plastic wrap
  7. Put in fridge for 20-30min
  8. Freeze for 15min
  9. Preheat over to 500F
  10. Cut dough
  11. Put in oven and lower temp to 425F
  12. Bake for 12-14min

item.title: Snowball Cookies
item.description:
ğŸ½ Snowball Cookies ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 1 cup butter
  2. 0.5 cup powdered sufar
  3. 1 teaspoon vanilla exxtract
  4. 2.25 cups flour
  5. 0.75 cup pecans, finely chopped
  6. 0.5 teaspoon salt
  7. Powder sugar for rolling

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Preheat oven to 400F
  2. In large bowl, cream:
    1. Butter
    2. Vanilla
    3. Powdered sugar
  3. Add and combine until holds together:
    1. Flour
    2. Salt
    3. Nuts
  4. Shape into 1 inch balls. Do not make too big
  5. Space 1 inch apart on parchment lined cookie sheet
  6. Freeze for 5 minutes
  7. Bake for 10-12mins, should NOT be brown
  8. Allow to cool for 3-5mins
  9. Roll in powdered sugar

item.title: Stovetop Sweetened Condensed Milk
item.description:
ğŸ½ Stovetop Sweetened Condensed Milk ->#

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 2 cups whole milk
  2. 1 cup sugar

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. In pre-heated medium hot saucepan:
    1. Whisk together
    2. Let sugar dissolve
    3. Reduce temperature just before milk boils
    4. Simmer until milk reduces (approx 35 minutes)
    5. Whisking a lot
    6. When reduced, allow to cool and store in fridge

item.title: Vanilla Custard
item.description:
ğŸ½ Vanilla Custard ->#

It’s a favorite. Costco ice cream is close, but this homemade custard is the best sweet treat in the world. It’s a tedious process and would probably be improved by getting the Kitchen-Aid specific bowl attachment, but right now we have the Kitchen-Aid countertop ice cream spinner thing that works.

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 4 cups whole milk
    1. can sub half and half or cream
  2. 1.25 cups sugar
  3. 0.33 cup corn starch
  4. 0.125 teaspoon salt
  5. 4 eggs
  6. 2 tablespoon vanilla extract
    1. The nicer the better
  7. 14 ounce sweetened condensed milk

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. In large saucepan, whisk:
    1. Corn starch
    2. Milk
    3. Sugar
  2. Heat mixture to 175F, while whisking constantly
  3. In small bowl:
    1. Whisk 2 eggs
    2. Acclimate eggs by ladling hot mixture from large saucepan slowly and gently into eggs, so they don’t curdle.
    3. Once eggs are properly acclimated to heat, pour eggs into large saucepan
  4. Heat large saucepan on low, continuing to whisk constantly.
  5. Mixture should reach at least 160F, coating the back of a spoon
  6. Remove from heat
  7. Immediately place in ice bath and stir for 2 minutes
  8. Stir in sweetened condensed milk and vanilla
  9. Put wax paper on surface of mixture, put in fridge overnight
  10. Using ice cream maker:
    1. Pour mixture into frozen cylinder, two-thirds full
    2. Fridge the rest of mixture
    3. Let mix spin until thickened (approx 30 minutes, depending)
  11. Freeze ice cream in tupperware for 2-4 hours minimum before serving

item.title: Waffles
item.description:
ğŸ½ Waffles ->#

Similar to pancakes

ğŸœ Ingredients#

  1. 2 large eggs
  2. 1.25 cups milk
  3. + tablespoons of milk
  4. 0.75 teaspoon salt
  5. 2 teaspoons baking powder
  6. 2 tablespoons sugar

ğŸ“‘ Directions#

  1. Beat milk and eggs until light/foamy
  2. Stir in butter
  3. Separately, whisk dry together
  4. Mix into wet
  5. Let rest for 15min
  6. Cook
